transcript:
Customer: Om bhu bhuva swaha.
Hellow.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Sir main Ashu bol rahi hu, kaise ho aap?
Executive: Thik hai ji.
Customer: Ravan sir main IndiaMART head office se baat kar rahi thi.
Executive: Hanji hanji.
Executive: Sir namaste.
Customer: Namaskar ji.
Executive: Sir kya aapka concern ek feedback aaya tha bad experience karke. 
Customer: Sir main wahi janna chah rahi thi ki kya reason hai sir. Mam subah call kiya tha to pata chala aap busy hai, mam ko bhi call kiya to boli mam ki sir busy hai. Isliye abhi call kiya aapko.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: To sir koi abhi tak order hi nahi aaya jo bhi aate hai fake hote hai sir, sabhi jo replies aate hai. 
Han.
Customer: Fake hi hote hai wo.
Customer: Jo bhi inquiries aati hai sabhi fake hi hoti hai.
Executive: Sir abhi aapki services jo mere platform pe live hui hai August me hui hai, September October gaya hai right? 
Han.
Executive: Aapka aur agar main do mahine me se aapka uses dekhu to last mahine aap 11 din kare hai to sir thoda matlab main ye nahi keh rahi ki 24 ghante aap wo kariye but thoda sa by leads ka jo consumption hai. 
Customer: To jitne jisko bhi humne phone kiya wo jaise aise lagta hai jaise fake hi hai wo.
Executive: Sir har matlab agar aap 17 by leads week consume kar rahe hai sir. 
Customer: Main aapko list bana ke bhej deta hu.
Executive: Sir list nahi chahiye aap jo bol rahe hai main usko man rahi hu ki ha ho raha hoga main aapko wo debate nahi kar rahi hu na main us pe wo kar rahi hu. Sir ek cheez aap kar sakte ho aap mujhe ye bataiye ki basically aapko kya jyada sabse jyada issue aati hai?
Customer: Nahi jo hamari jo jo hamari items hai uski to inquiry aayi nahi koi bhi.
Executive: Kya sir sunai nahi de raha.
Customer: Jo aati hai wo fake hi aati hai.
Customer: Jo aati hai wo fake hi aati hai to matlab in terms of kya sir location. 
Executive: Main nahi pata mujhe nahi pata aap aapki se hoga koi setting hogi mere ko nahi pata ji.
Executive: Jo hame to business ne humne to business ke liye liya tha. Business to mil hi nahi raha hame.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir main ye keh rahi hu ki jaise aap jo by leads purchase karte hai aapka main jaise aapki category me abhi jo dekh rahi hu aapki jo categories hai mere platform pe wo hai basically aapka khud ka pain relief ka kuch hai product hai right organic wala.
Hanji.
Executive: Right ha to aapka ye khud ka hi brand hai?
Hanji? 
Executive: Sir aap khud ke brand me hi deal karte hai na?
Customer: Nahi nahi master me bhi hai waise khud ke bhi hai dono tarah hai.
Executive: Ha dono hai wo to main bhi dekh rahi hu sir kuch kuch organic India ka hai aapka kuch organic India ke hi mostly product aapke dikh rahe hai mere paas ek apple cider vinegar jo hai wo alu vival ka hai. 
Han.
Executive: Alag alag.
Customer: Wo apna khud ka hi hai apna.
Executive: Ha to sir main ye keh rahi hu aapko apne brand ke liye chahiye ki aap dusre ke brand ke lead ko purchase karke fir aap waha pe apna brand introduce karenge yahi hai na sir aapka?
Customer: Hanji hanji hanji.
Executive: To sir aap ye mujhe bataiye aap jab by leads purchase karne jaate hai aap by leads jab purchase karte hai to kya dekh ke karte hai aap thoda sa mujhe elaborate kariye na sir.
Hanji.
Executive: Tabhi to main jaan paungi ki aapko ye dikkat aa rahi hai aap aise bol rahe hai ki har buyer se aap connect karte ho har buyer aapko bolta hai ki fake hai to main wahi aapse jaanna chah rahi hu sir ki kis terms me fake hai category relevant nahi aati kya nahi hota hai sir.
Customer: Main thoda abhi busy hu main sham to sham ko kitne baje kar sakta hu aapko phone?
Executive: Sir main 6 baje tak office me hu sir.
Customer: Ha main bas 5:30 tak aapko phone karta hu.
Executive: Sir abhi mujhe thoda sa time de denge to main aapko abhi bhi help kar sakti hu.
Customer: Nahi mam main busy hu abhi. Wo customer hai na mere paas.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Jo physically customer hai wo to mere ko attend karne do na.
Executive: Ha nahi nahi sir bilkul bilkul kar lijiye sir 5:30 karu?
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Okay thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states all inquiries are fake.

- No inquiries for their own items.

- No business is being generated.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive offered to help immediately.

- Executive scheduled a follow-up call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 5:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, fake inquiries, business, follow-up
